Title: The health facilities of New China
Designer: Chinese National Science Popularization Association (中华全国科学技术普及协会)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: A five-poster series from 1952.The text under the photograph explains "After the founding of New China, in order to fight for the eradication of smallpox within three to five years, mass vaccination campaigns were launched across the country. This is a collective vaccination of Beijing primary school students."
